<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_906853_corpora_0_e_wallet_request_by_managers</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_906853_corpora_0_e_wallet_request_by_managers">request_statusCHANGESTOApproval Requested^EQ<item display_value="Approval Requested" endquery="false" field="request_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="Approval Requested"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Budget Validation</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var budget = current.requested_by.e_wallet_budget;
    var amount = current.amount_to_be_added;
    if ( parseInt(amount)> parseInt(budget)) {
        current.request_status = 'Rejected';
        current.update();
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-11 15:41:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>702bb5a12fd042105ba5b8e72799b652</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Budget Validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Corporate Gifting" source="x_906853_corpora_0">a40c72102fe731105ba5b8e72799b626</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Corporate Gifting">a40c72102fe731105ba5b8e72799b626</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_702bb5a12fd042105ba5b8e72799b652</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-11 15:42:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=702bb5a12fd042105ba5b8e72799b652"/></record_update>
